Truth's champion or an elegie on the much to be lamented death of that pious and godly minister of the Gospel. Mr. Alexander Shields.
1 sheet ([1] p.)
s.n., [Edinburgh : 1700?]
In verse. Caption title. Text within black mourning border. Imprint from Wing. Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
